content: crochet the new york medley scarf with scheepjes wanderlust medium weight yarn and a 4 5 mm hook the finished scarf measures about 10 inches wide and 50 inches long and you can make it longer or wider using the stitch multiple included in the pattern row-by-row photos are included to help you follow the stitches this is an easy and relaxing project with simple clean texture you can find the free pattern on my website **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol > this pattern was originally designed > by joanita theron it is now available > exclusively at oombawka design > crochet joanita theron has sold the > full copyright for this pattern and > all associated images to oombawka > design ltd
